Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Oriente Atiram Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Barcelona, steps from Gran Teatre del Liceu and Placa Reial. This hotel is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana and Casa Batllo.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 147 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Barcelona? This hotel has facilities measuring 1851 square feet (172 square meters), including a meeting room.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 147 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

With a stay at Oriente Atiram Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Barcelona, steps from Gran Teatre del Liceu and Placa Reial. This hotel is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana and Casa Batllo.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Gran Teatre del Liceu - 0 km / 0 mi
Placa Reial - 0.1 km / 0 mi
Palau Guell - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Teatre Principal - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Las Ramblas - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Teatre Romea - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Filmoteca de Catalunya - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Centre d'Art Santa Monica - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Hospital de la Santa Creu de Barcelona - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Boqueria Market - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Virreina Palace - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Barcelona Wax Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Placa de Sant Jaume - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Museu del Calcat - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Palau de la Generalitat de Catalunya - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for Oriente Atiram Hotel is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 11.8 km / 7.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Husa Oriente is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 11.8 km / 7.3 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Room 1
Check in time: 2pmCheck out time: 12pm
Notice
The Catalan government applies a tax regulation for hotel stays in Catalonia. The charges are per person (age 17 and over) per night (up to 7 nights stay) and are applicable by the following scheme: Catalonia: 5* hotel Barcelona City 2.48 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 2.48 VAT included 4* hotel Barcelona City 1.21 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.99 VAT included Apartments – holiday homes – tourist accommodation Barcelona City 2.48 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.99 VAT included Rest of accommodation types Barcelona City 0.72 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.50 VAT included. Tax is payable directly at the hotel upon arrival.
